title: strip binary  can not workable
body:
For a simple C hello world binary, after striped binary, when I strip it again. It won't
be striped again.

But, for Go binary, if I use 'file', it will get the following information.
ELF 32-bit LSB executable, Intel 80386, version 1 (SYSV), dynamically linked (uses
shared libs), stripped

But, the binary is allowed to strip again.  Unfortunately, the after striped file can
not run.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
8g

Which operating system are you using?
i686

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
r7599 2011/03/02
